name: Glow (itch) (H2ohno)
description:
Glow is a third-person puzzle exploration game set in a submerged, post-apocalyptic London. The main character is Glow, an aquatic mythical/alien-like creature, who was experimented on in an underground lab. They’re seeking Blossom, another one of their kind who disappeared after the lab flooded. Possessing mirrors and manipulating a beam of light that Blossom placed, Glow must navigate through the darkness to find their friend.

How to play:

  • Download and Unzip the file.
  • Run “Glow.exe."
  • An Xbox controller is HIGHLY recommended, but Glow can be played with keyboard and mouse.

Controls:

Controller:

Slow Move - Right Trigger.

Boost - Left Trigger.

Move Camera/Move Light Beam - Right analogue stick.

Interact/Move Mirror - X.

Keyboard and Mouse:

Slow Move - Left Mouse (Hold).

Boost - Right Mouse (Hold).

Move Camera/Move Light Beam - Move Mouse.

Interact/Move Mirror - E.
